task_description: 生成吼巷IP形象蓝白配色花纹三视图，包含正面、侧面、背面视角，展示装饰性花纹和层次感配色

input_data.text_prompt: Professional three-view character design sheet, front view side view back view layout, cute cartoon cat mascot IP character, Q-style chibi proportion with large head and small body, deep navy blue and white color scheme, standing upright pose with exaggerated roaring expression and wide open mouth, decorative ethnic patterns and totems on body surface in white color, geometric and abstract ornamental designs on arms legs and back, smooth 3D rendering with ceramic-like texture quality, layered visual depth through blue-white color contrast, fine hand-drawn style pattern details, soft studio lighting creating gentle shadows, clean white background, professional character turnaround sheet for brand IP design, restaurant mascot character, Yunnan ethnic minority style decorative elements, high detail and clarity suitable for design reference
design_requirements: 三个视角并排展示：正面、侧面、背面
深蓝色+白色配色方案，形成层次对比
身体表面添加装饰性花纹（几何图案、民族图腾）
保持夸张的吼叫表情和品牌识别度
3D立体渲染，光滑质感带纹理细节
白色背景，便于设计参考
三个视角风格、配色、花纹完全一致
input_data.negative_prompt: low quality, blurry, messy background, inconsistent style between views, flat 2D style, no patterns, single color, realistic photo style, dark background, separate images, low resolution

metadata.notes: 吼巷IP形象蓝白配色花纹三视图设计稿，用于展示正面、侧面、背面的完整角色设计
